textos_fuente.text: Golf Classic Application – Carnaval Miami Skip to content Carnaval Miami A Celebration of all Things "MIAMI" ABOUT EVENTS Calle Ocho Music Festival VIP Access Carnaval on the Mile KIDZ NOOK Golf Classic Domino Tournament Soccer 5v5 Miss Carnaval 2025 Pickleball Poster Artist KINGS & QUEENS SPONSORSHIP OPPORTUNITIES SPONSORS About Events Calle Ocho Carnaval on The Mile Golf Classic Domino Tournament Soccer 5v5 Miss Carnaval 2025 Pickleball Poster Artist Kings & Queens Sponsorship Opportunities News GDPR Notification Golf Classic Application You are here: Home Events Golf Classic Golf Classic Application Dear Golfer, Our Golf Classic Tournament for 2025 is around the corner, and we look forward to receiving your applications again. Please follow the 3 steps: Fill in the application on this page Pay your application fee via PayPal or a Credit Card Wait for the approval email The deadline to register your application is February 15, 2025. Once we have reviewed it, we will email all participants. Event Details Registration: 10:00 am – 12:30 noon Lunch: 11:30 am – 12:30 noon Shot Gun: 12:30 noon Buffet Dinner & Awards: 5:30 pm Event Prices Prices: Golf Foursome: $2,000 Tee Signs: $350 Individual Entry: $600 Company Banner at the entrance of the event: $650 Sponsorship Opportunities Available upon Request. Contact: Jlarrosa@kiwanislittlehavana.org Proceeds benefit the Scholarship Program of Kiwanis of Little Havana Foundation, a 501 (c) (3) non-profit organization. Step 1. Fill out the Application [contact-form-7 id=”2578″ title=”Golf Classic Application”] Step 2. Pay for the Application Submit Application or send to Lidia Sanchez: Lsanchez@kiwanislittlehavana.org Options Foursome $2,000.00 USD Tee Signs $350.00 USD Individual Entry $600.00 USD Company Banner at Entrance of Event $650.00 USD Step 3. Receive Confirmation Email Once we have received your application to the event, a separate email will be sent to you with all the details. Step 4. Upload your company Logo If you choose the “Tee Signs” or “Company Banner” option, please upload your company logo here. Please upload a High Resolution image with transparent background in one of the following formats: .png, .pdf or .ai [contact-form-7 id=”2618″ title=”Golf Classic Logo”] For questions contact Lidia Sanchez/Foundation Administrator at 305.644.8888 Lsanchez@kiwanislittlehavana.org For questions contact Lidia Sanchez/ Foundation Administrator at 305.644.8888 lsanchez@kiwanislittlehavana.org Carnaval Miami is powered by Kiwanis Club of Little Havana to benefit the Kiwanis of Little Havana Foundation. Home | Contact | Terms & Conditions | Privacy Policy © 2018 CARNAVAL MIAMI. All rights reserved. Go to Top

The entrance is FREE, so bring everyone to the festival and celebrate Carnaval on the Mile 2025, our 26th-anniversary edition! Click here for more information about this activity Please help us keep this calendar up to date! If this activity is sold out, canceled, or otherwise needs alteration, email mindy@kidsoutandabout.com so we can update it immediately. If you have a question about the activity itself, please contact the organization administrator listed below. Click to view the Entertainment Guide 2024 Carnaval Miami *Times, dates, and prices of any activity posted to our calendars are subject to change. Please be sure to click through directly to the organization’s website to verify. Location: Miracle Mile - Coral Gables Miracle Mile Coral Gables , NY , 33134 United States See map: Google Maps Phone: (305) 644-8888 Contact name: Info Email address: info@carnavalmiami.com Click for more information The event has already taken place on this date: 03/02/2025 Time: 10:00AM Price: FREE Ages Adults & kids together Adults without kids Tags: Event Annual event Craft sale / bazaar Festival/fair Food event Outdoors Event Performance Arts Outdoors Web Service Pinterest Share on Facebook Tweet Widget Featured in Miami Celebrating local experiences across North America To provide parents with all of the information they need to help them and their kids get "out and about" to fantastic opportunities for fun, education, and cultural enrichment in our area. To celebrate and share information on the many splendid artistic, cultural and recreational activities available to residents of cities across the US and Canada. We invite you to join us as a corporate partner and become a part of the Carnaval Miami experience! Carnaval Miami celebrates South Florida’s colorful landscape and rich cultural heritage while creating memorable experiences that keep us connected to our diverse community. All sponsorship packages can be customized to meet prospective sponsors’ goals. Strategic sponsorship plans can be developed to meet individual partner needs. Carnaval on the Mile 2024 - Event - Carlos Apitz POP ART +1 (305) 482-3027‬ info@carlosapitz.com 0 elementos Home Us Carlos Apitz Painting classes Caricatures at Events SHOP Art Clothing Accessories Creative Services Portfolio Web Design Logo Design Brochures and others PDFs Samples Packaging design sample illustrations Blog Contact Frequently asked questions EN EN ES Seleccionar página Carnaval On The Mile 2024 On Saturday March 2 and Sunday, March 3, Carlos Apitz and the best of his Venezuela POP Art will be waiting for you at Carnival on the Mile 2023 at Booth #26 from 9 am. Yeah! We will be here, Booth #26 of the Carnival on the Mile in the Art section, with the best of my art in the Venezuela POP Art style. If you are looking for art that identifies with you and with Venezuela I will be here, this is your opportunity to spend a good weekend with the family and get to know my artistic work. This is already a tradition, it is the fourth year that we have attended and we are very excited waiting for your visit, in this edition Carlos Apitz will exhibit new original works in the POP ART style. This is possible thanks to the splendid work of the Little Havana Kiwanis, who are in charge of organizing this event every year, this is the 25th-anniversary edition of Carnival on the Mile, and I am honored to be selected along with other talented artists . But Carnival on the Mile is much more than presenting my work, it is a fun occasion to have fun and walk around Coral Gables with family and friends, see the incredible work of other artists who exhibit their works, listen to live music, eat and also for children to play, it is an event for everyone and for everyone who lives in Miami. Once again I invite you to stop by my Stand identified with #26, visit me, and see my work, or let’s talk, I love listening to the stories of my people. I leave you information that will be useful for your visit to the Carnival On The Mile 2024. Carnaval on the Mile 2024  LOCATION Miracle Mile in Coral Gables, click for parking and directions.  SCHEDULE Saturday March 2 and Sunday March 3, from 9 am. Click here to see activities and their hours.  FREE PASS Art, food, and children’s entertainment stands. Three concert stages and much more. Boards of Directors – Carnival Corporation & plc Skip to content Our Company Our Purpose Our Brands Our History Leadership Boards of Directors Media Center News Releases In The News Feature Stories Snapshots Resources Media Library Media Contacts Investors Financial Information Stock Performance Shareholder Information Analyst Information Investor Services Impact Sustainability Community Relations Good Health, Inclusion & Belonging Governance Governance Guidelines Committee Details Business Conduct & Ethics Legal Notices company information Boards of Directors Micky is Chair of the Board of Directors of Carnival Corporation and Carnival plc, the largest global cruise company with a diversified portfolio of world-class cruise line brands that serve virtually every market segment from contemporary to ultra-luxury, as well as leading port destinations and land operations in Alaska and the Yukon. Micky brings to the role decades of leadership experience with Carnival Corporation & plc, including in-depth knowledge of the business, history and the cruise industry overall. Read Bio Micky Arison Chair of the Boards Carnival Corporation & plc Sir Jonathon has served on the Boards of Directors of Carnival Corporation and Carnival plc since 2010. In this role, he serves as chair of the company’s Health, Environmental, Safety & Security Committees and is also a member of the Nominating & Governance Committees and the Compliance Committees. Read Bio Sir Jonathon Band Independent Director Carnival Corporation & plc Jason has served on the Boards of Directors of Carnival Corporation and Carnival plc since 2017. He also currently serves as a member of the Audit Committees and Compensation Committees. Read Bio Jason Glen Cahilly Independent Director Carnival Corporation & plc Nelda has served on the Boards of Directors of Carnival Corporation and Carnival plc since 2024. In this role, she serves as a member of the Health, Environmental, Safety & Security Committees. Read Bio Nelda J. Connors Independent Director Carnival Corporation & plc Helen has served on the Boards of Directors of Carnival Corporation and Carnival plc since 2016. In this role, she serves on the Compensation Committees and Health, Environmental, Safety & Security Committees. Read Bio Helen Deeble Independent Director Carnival Corporation & plc Jeff has served on the Boards of Directors of Carnival Corporation and Carnival plc since 2020. In this role, he serves as chair of the Compliance Committees and member of the Audit Committees. Read Bio Jeffrey J. Gearhart Independent Director Carnival Corporation & plc Katie has served on the Boards of Directors of Carnival Corporation and Carnival plc since 2019. In this role, she serves as a member of the Nominating & Governance Committees and Health, Environmental, Safety & Security Committees. Read Bio Katie Lahey Independent Director Carnival Corporation & plc Stu has served on the Board of Directors of Carnival Corporation since 1987 and on the Board of Directors of Carnival plc since 2003. In this role, he serves as chair of the Nominating & Governance Committees, as well as a member of the Audit Committees and Compliance Committees. Read Bio Stuart Subotnick Independent Director Carnival Corporation & plc Laura has served on the Boards of Directors of Carnival Corporation and Carnival plc since 2007. In this role, she serves as chair of the Audit Committees and member of the Compensation Committees and Compliance Committees. Read Bio Laura Weil Independent Director Carnival Corporation & plc Josh is Chief Executive Officer of Carnival Corporation & plc and leads one of the world’s largest leisure travel companies that boasts a portfolio of world-class cruise line brands including AIDA Cruises, Carnival Cruise Line, Costa Cruises, Cunard, Holland America Line, P&O Cruises, Princess Cruises and Seabourn. Read Bio Josh Weinstein Chief Executive Officer Carnival Corporation & plc Mr. Weisenburger’s qualifications to serve on the Boards include his broad leadership and operational skills gained as a senior executive of a large multi-national corporation and his extensive financial and accounting skills acquired as an investment banker and senior financial operating executive. He also has broad experience in corporate governance, having served as a director, past and present, of a number of other publicly-traded companies. Read Bio Randy J.
